section.title: Image source configuration
section.para: The default configuration for the OpenStreetMap layer will use the Mapnik rendering of OpenStreetMap by round robin iteration over the following base URLs:
This is configurable at two levels.
You can configure the URLs which are used for the tiles. You define the different options using ${level}, ${x} and ${y} for the zoom level and tile coordinate. A simple configuration looks like this:
You can also define the strategy to choose between the different URLs which have been configured. By default, the URLs will be chosen using a round robin strategy.
For example, the sample below uses the cycle map tiles and selects the class to use for the URL selection strategy (this needs to implement UrlSelectionStrategy).

section.title: Zoom level configuration
section.para: By default the maximum zoom level is 19, but this can be modified using the maxZoomLevel property if your data source supports a different level.
